alert.note: Alert for Meade; Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 17 at 1:28PM MDT until May 17 at 2:30PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Meade County in west central South Dakota... Northwestern Pennington County in west central South Dakota... * Until 230 PM MDT. * At 128 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Summerset, or 8 miles northwest of Rapid City, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Ellsworth Air Force Base, northern Box Elder, Black Hawk and Summerset. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 47 and 54. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
